titleStmt.title: The discoverer discovered; or, The lot cast, T.C. taken, and the Babylonish garment found hid under his stuff Being a reply to a late pamphlet, entituled, A discovery of the accursed thing, &c. subscribed T.C. With some remarks upon two papers of John Penny man's. By E.P.
titleStmt.author: Penington, Edward, 1667-1701.

titleStmt.title: The discoverer discovered; or, The lot cast, T.C. taken, and the Babylonish garment found hid under his stuff Being a reply to a late pamphlet, entituled, A discovery of the accursed thing, &c. subscribed T.C. With some remarks upon two papers of John Penny man's. By E.P.
titleStmt.author: Penington, Edward, 1667-1701.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed and sold by T. Sowle, near the Meeting-house in White-Hart-Count, in Gracious-Street,

notesStmt.note: A reply to: Crisp, Thomas. The discovery of the accursed thing in the Foxonian Quakers camp.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
